## ITypedArrayTupleFactory.copyFromBuffer() method

If endianness is not supplied the platform's endianness will be used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyFromBuffer(memoryDataView: DataView, pointer: number, writeTo?: TArray, littleEndian?: boolean): TArray;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  memoryDataView | DataView |  |
|  pointer | number |  |
|  writeTo | TArray |  |
|  littleEndian | boolean |  |

TArray
